title: Amazing studio with 24 hr gym&doorman, sauna, floor to ceiling windows
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Interested in this property?  Click on: Reply to this listing for more information  ** if you are texting us, please include the link to the listing so we can identify what you are inquiring on  This amazing luxury hi rise building is located in the heart of Lincoln Park, just a step away from the lake and the zoo.  This building offers extremely easy access to public transportation including the el train as well as multiple buses. Take  advantage of this amazing studio now. Cats & dogs ok. Garage parking extra. No security deposit,  This building has fabulous amenities including: -Spectacular vews -24 hour doorman and maintenance -On site valet, dry cleaner and package receiving -Extra bicycle storage room -24 hour state of the art fitness center with private sauna -On site laundry facility -Business center with high speed internet stations -Private gourmet coffee service in building -Rooftop sundeck with dramatic lake and city views -Steps to all the amazing dining, shopping and exciting nightlife  This unit offers spacious floor plan with great views and includes: -Lots of closet space including walk in closets -Wall to wall carpeting -Floor to ceiling windows with city views -Over sized baths -Ceramic title flooring in kitchen and baths   Velocity Apartment Group  312-253-7403 *****For faster response from one of our Agents, please provide your cell phone number, move date and email address when inquiring.  Thank you.  Availability and pricing may change at any time without notice. Ads subject to errors and omissions. Please contact agent for additional questions and information.
